descriptions.legal: Legal support for companies, including contract drafting and review, business legal consultation, labour law, and protection of company interests at every stage.
descriptions.physical: Legal assistance for individuals: real estate, family law, employment rights, property protection and various types of legal disputes. All Right will help you at every stage.
descriptions.audits: Legal audit for companies, enabling you to identify risks, gaps and legal threats in business in advance.
descriptions.court: Expert court representation in civil, commercial and administrative cases. Our experienced lawyers will protect your interests in court proceedings.
descriptions.realEstate: Real estate law: purchase and sale, registration, land plots, protection of property rights and legal security for any real estate transaction.
